cards.title: Describe your site to a REAL human
cards.description: Tell us what you need — from design to functionality. Attach any references or a Figma link to guide our developers.

cards.description: deco.cx's community of expert developers and designers will take your vision and turn it into reality.

cards.title: Get Site Done fast and cheap

sections.title: 2 types of services to choose from

cards.title: Find a Professional

Ideal for more complex projects with a strict deadline

Describe your idea to the community and get different options to choose from

Ideal for more flexible projects

accordions.title: How does deco.cx select service providers?
accordions.description: We've implemented an experience level system for our community of developers and designers. This system allows us to identify each individual's experience and skills to connect them with projects that match their needs.

accordions.title: Difficulty levels
accordions.description:
There are four difficulty levels: easy, medium, difficult, and complex. Difficulty levels are set by the client when opening the bounty but can be re-evaluated by the deco team.

Easy

These are projects that do not require technical complexities and that beginners can handle. They may be projects that already have a defined identity, require up to 2 pages, have simple functions, and have a comfortable delivery time. Some examples include:

  • Customizing a website template

  • Designing or implementing a landing page

  • Creating the layout of a simple blog

  • These projects typically pay between $100 and $200 USD.



Medium

These are projects that can only be carried out by intermediate-level professionals who have already executed other projects previously. Examples include:
  • Migrating an institutional website with a few pages to deco
  • Implementing an ecommerce PoC
  • Designing a complete website
  • These projects typically pay between $200 and $500 USD.



Difficult

These are projects that require experienced professionals with previous experience in the type of service requested, at a similar level of complexity. Example:
  • Complete implementation of a headless storefront
  • These projects typically pay more than $500 USD.



Complex

These are projects that require expert professionals with extensive prior experience in the same type of service requested, and who are capable of dealing with challenging factors such as tight deadlines in the face of the complexity demanded by the project.
  • These projects typically pay more than $750 USD.

accordions.title: Payments
accordions.description:
0% take rate. All invested money goes to the selected developer or designer.

Once your website is ready, deco.cx offers plans to implement it according to your needs. If you want to understand better, click here.

accordions.title: Contests
accordions.description:
Contests are open to anyone who wants to participate, without restrictions! Professionals study the project's briefing, develop their proposal, and send it to the person who requested it, to evaluate the result.

This is an ideal alternative for those who have more flexibility in the project and want to have the opportunity to evaluate different alternatives.

You can request a contest with the amount you want and you can increase it over time to attract more professionals to carry out your project.

After the winner of the contest is selected by the person who requested the site, the parties can negotiate any necessary adjustments later.
